column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So good! The line can get super crazy so you'll want to time this right--early on a weekday. There's a ton of space inside (multiple levels) but still. The food itself is incredible. The Lou came out and the small size served two of us perfectly--we finished it and were full but not hating ourselves too much. The service is friendly and quick! However
column2: as is typical with true deep dish
column3: you can expect to wait about 40 minutes for your pie.
